body:
Comment 3: 
I'm going to mark this as "retracted" for now.  Please follow up on this issue if you
see 
the behavior again.  I'm a little worried about it being a non-deterministic compiler
bug, 
but it seems equally possible it could have been a transient hardware glitch.  That test 
really pounds on the arithmetic.
_Status changed to **Retracted**._
